attributes.action: Form a crossparty "Unity" cabinet until the UK's EU exit has been negotiated.
attributes.additional_details:
The precedent for this is the wartime cabinet Churchill assembled.

As we face our biggest challenge democratically, politically, economically and constitutionally for at least a generation now is not the time for party politics.

A show of solidarity between parties could help heal the wounds caused by the socially and politically divisive Brexit vote in UK society.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call for all political parties to work together through a "Unity" Cabinet, calling on talent from across the political spectrum, until the UK's exit from the EU has been fully negotiated.
